name: Muster - Music Gamehub
description:
More than 15 music games with popular songs give you relaxing moments with a great music experience.

◉ With games: Magic Tiles, Tiles Hop, Dancing Road,... and many other attractive games.

◉ Extensive music library updated weekly with the latest songs and even the most popular singers.


ATTENTION:

◉ Muster is suitable for devices from iPhone 6 and above. Use with previous devices may affect your gaming experience.
